Implementing a mobile app that allows visitors to track their carbon footprint and suggests ways to reduce it while visiting the park.
Creating an interactive exhibit that uses virtual reality technology to allow visitors to experience the park in a new way.
Organizing a community service project where volunteers work with local organizations to restore and preserve areas of the park.
Developing a series of educational programs for schools that focus on conservation and sustainability.
Partnering with local businesses to offer eco-friendly products and services within the park.
